short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and autofill passwords - Manage sessions. Design by LQC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Effortlessly manage your passwords and sessions with Passwords & Sessions Manager! Designed to streamline your online experience, this extension lets you securely save and autofill passwords, as well as manage active sessions across tabs and websites.


Key Features:

Save and Autofill Passwords: Store your credentials securely and autofill them with ease.
Session Management: Manage multiple sessions across different sites without logging in repeatedly.

Enhanced Privacy: Uses cookies management to keep your data private and organized.
Smart Automation: Runs in the background to monitor and assist with your browsing needs seamlessly.


Why Choose Passwords & Sessions Manager?

With an intuitive design and powerful session management, this extension is ideal for anyone looking to simplify their login and session processes. Perfect for users who need quick access across sites while keeping data secure.
